update goodsinfo
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_subtitle = #{goodsSubtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gc_id = #{gcId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gc_name = #{gcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
goods_sell_price = #{goodsSellPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
goods_image = #{goodsImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_click = #{goodsClick,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_state = #{goodsState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_commend = #{goodsCommend,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_close_reason = #{goodsCloseReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comment_num = #{commentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
thumbs_up_num = #{thumbsUpNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
salenum_num = #{salenumNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_collect_num = #{goodsCollectNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goodsinfo set goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_subtitle = #{goodsSubtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gc_id = #{gcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gc_name = #{gcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, goods_sell_price = #{goodsSellPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, goods_image = #{goodsImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_click = #{goodsClick,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_state = #{goodsState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_commend = #{goodsCommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_close_reason = #{goodsCloseReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment_num = #{commentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, thumbs_up_num = #{thumbsUpNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, salenum_num = #{salenumNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_collect_num = #{goodsCollectNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT * FROM goodsinfo WHERE create_time>=#{startTime} AND #{endTime}>=create_time
